name: Lifting man
description:
Keep lifting until You fall.

Strongest man in the world tried to lift on the top of skyscraper. Will he be able to hold on with additional weight?

Be careful! Different colors, and different shapes falling down with different speed and different weight!

Play with mouse OR with game pad OR maybe with both? It's up to You!

Mouse playing:

Go with mouse arrow to the right or the left of Lifting man, to add or reduce balance

Game Pad playing

Press Game Pad joystick to the right or the left of Lifting man, to add or reduce balance.

Balance is displayed on top of the screen

Remember! You only score, when You are perfectly balanced. So keep balanced!
